snippet: WAITZMAN--Harry. Poet, Retired attorney, town justice. Died July 18. Survived by wife Marcia, two children, seven grandchildren, and one great-grandchild. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: WAITZMAN--Harry. Poet, Retired attorney, town justice. Died July 18. Survived by wife Marcia, two children, seven grandchildren, and one great-grandchild. 1/3
